# mihai.codes

> Personal portfolio and blog of Mihai Chindris - Aspiring Product Manager, Software Engineering student at Quantic, and open-source contributor. Built with Qwik, Tailwind CSS, and Cloudflare Pages.

## About Mihai Chindris

Mihai is a software professional based in Maramures, Romania with 3+ years at Siemens spanning Application Support, Azure Development, and cloud operations. Currently pursuing an M.S. in Software Engineering at Quantic School of Business & Technology with focus on AI, machine learning, and cloud architectures.

### Contact
- Email: hello@mihai.codes
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/mihai-chindris
- GitHub: https://github.com/chindris-mihai-alexandru

## Blog Posts

Technical articles on engineering, cloud computing, and building in public.

- [AWS Bedrock + Anthropic Claude: The Complete Troubleshooting Guide](/blog/aws-bedrock-anthropic-troubleshooting): Three undocumented gotchas that will save you hours of debugging when setting up Claude models on AWS Bedrock. Tags: aws, bedrock, anthropic, cloud
- [Building AI Agents with OpenCode and Free LLMs](/blog/building-ai-agents-with-opencode): How to set up an autonomous AI coding agent using OpenCode, OpenRouter, and completely free language models. Tags: ai, opencode, agents, cloud
- [Why I Chose Qwik Over Next.js](/blog/why-qwik): A deep dive into resumability, hydration, and why Qwik's approach to JavaScript is revolutionary. Tags: qwik, javascript, frameworks
- [Hello, World!](/blog/hello-world): Welcome to my corner of the internet. Here's what I'm building and why. Tags: personal, meta

## Projects

- [EasyParkPlus](https://github.com/heshamsakr/EasyParkPlus-Refactor): Enterprise Parking & EV Charging Architecture - Domain-Driven Design and microservices for scalable multi-facility parking systems
- [Cafe Fausse](https://github.com/chindris-mihai-alexandru/cafe-fausse): Full-Stack Restaurant Web Application - Intelligent reservation engine with dynamic table allotment
- [Lily's Florist Shop](https://www.figma.com/design/cDdidMI5ehr2Lgp7htOpar/Lily-s-Florist-Shop-Mockup-Wireframes): Design & Requirements - User stories, journey mapping, and Figma wireframes

## Technical Skills

Product Management, Software Engineering, Azure, API Integration, Cloud Technologies, Observability, User Experience Design, Agile Methodologies, Open Source Contribution

## Certifications

- AWS Academy Cloud Foundations
- ITIL Foundation 4 First Look
- Azure Essential Training for Developers
- Google Digital Marketing Fundamentals

## Tech Stack

| Layer | Technology |
|-------|------------|
| Framework | Qwik + Qwik City |
| Styling | Tailwind CSS |
| CMS | Sanity (headless) |
| Hosting | Cloudflare Pages (edge) |
| Language | TypeScript |

### Architecture

```
Sanity Studio ──> Sanity API <── mihai.codes (Qwik + CF)
```

## Repository Structure

```
src/
├── components/     # Reusable UI components (theme-toggle, social-links, etc.)
├── context/        # Qwik context providers (theme)
├── data/           # Static data (profile.ts)
├── lib/            # Utilities (Sanity client)
├── utils/          # Helpers (sanitize, etc.)
└── routes/         # File-based routing
    ├── index.tsx   # Home page
    ├── blog/       # Blog routes (fetches from Sanity)
    ├── sitemap.xml/# Dynamic sitemap
    └── rss.xml/    # RSS feed
```
